title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Skills: Student-Led Computing Task Design—Mathematical Application Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic operation skills, experience solving simple problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Students can express mathematical problem-solving processes in three or more ways by connecting them with computational tools.
Learners design and implement computing projects tailored to their areas of interest (e.g., gaming, music, sports).
Each learner participates in peer assessment, evaluating project completeness using five or more feedback criteria.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
